alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Geneva, northwestern Jackson, central Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Graceville to 9 miles north of Bonifay to 7 miles northeast of De Funiak Springs. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Malone, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Campbellton, Noma, Richter Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Tendil Crossing, Gritney, Holland Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Jacobs, Hickory Hill, Noma Junction and Bahoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
